Profile: Seasoned Front-End Web Developer with over 20 years of experience delivering high-quality, user-centered digital solutions across diverse industries including healthcare, finance, education, and technology. Proven expertise in React, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML/CSS, and modern UI frameworks such as Next.js and AngularJS. Skilled in building scalable, accessible interfaces, leading development teams, and implementing reusable component libraries. Adept at driving performance, mentoring junior engineers, and streamlining development through Agile methodologies and testing best practices. Passionate about continuous learning, innovation, and delivering seamless user experiences across platforms.

Technologies.Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, HTML5, CSS3, JSON, XML
Technologies.Tools / Libraries: React, Redux, Next.js, AngularJS, Material, Bootstrap, SCSS, Tailwind, jQuery, ESLint, Node, NPM, Express, Webpack, Jest, GIT, GitLab, GraphQL, Bitbucket, Jasmine, Jenkins, Agile, Scrum, Kanban Methodologies
Technologies.Software: WebStorm, Visual Studio Code, Eclipse, IntelliJ, Fiddler, Postman, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe XD, Confluence, JIRA, Figma

IndustryExperience: Energy, Restaurant, Communication, Commodity Trading, Sports, Healthcare, Pharmacy Tech, Insurance, Integrated Digital Technologies, Marketing, Financial, Education, Automotive, Railroad, and Beverage
Competencies: My competencies encompass a broad spectrum of UI Design and Development, UI Architecture, Project Design and Development, Framework Development, Object-Oriented Programming, User Experience (UX), and Usability. This comprehensive skill set enables me to deliver high-quality solutions across various projects.
